title: Query String to Object
description: In this lab, we will explore how to convert a query string or URL into an object using JavaScript. We will use the String.prototype.split() method to extract the parameters from the URL, then create an object using the URLSearchParams constructor and convert it into an array of key-value pairs. Finally, we will use Array.prototype.reduce() to convert the array into a JavaScript object. This lab will help you understand how to manipulate and extract data from URLs and query strings in JavaScript.
